suggest.drupal/commerce_bulk: Provides a service for bulk creation of Drupal Commerce entities. Reqiured by the Commerce Combined Attributes submodule.
suggest.drupal/commerce_xquantity: Allows to set quantity field's default_value, step, min, max, prefix and suffix on a form display widget. Also, helps to avoid incorrectly chosen attribute errors on a page with multiple "Add to cart" forms.
